ygData.msgSnippet: Running a domain-scope crawl (62 seeds) using BDB frontier I m running out of memory about 48% of the way through. Various vitals: Dual CPU P3, 1G physical

Subject: Leaks in CVS HEAD?

Running a domain-scope crawl (62 seeds) using BDB frontier I'm running
out of memory about 48% of the way through. Various vitals:

Dual CPU P3, 1G physical memory, running Gentoo 2.6.8-gentoo-r3 kernel.
Java 1.5.0-b64.
Heritrix 1.3 HEAD, built on 7 Febuary around 11AM EST.

The log is full of warning messages like:

02/12/2005 09:19:55 +0000 WARNING org.archive.crawler.extractor.ExtractorHTML innerProcess Failed get of replay char sequence CrawlURI(http://mosabeghelaliga.persianblog.com/1383_3_mosabeghelaliga_archive.html) null ToeThread #22

This may not be problematic --- though I've not seen these before on other crawls.

Then I see blocks like:

glyphCount=0 flags=10001
glyphCount=0 flags=10000
glyphCount=0 flags=10000
glyphCount=60 flags=10010001
glyphCount=42 flags=10010001
glyphCount=0 flags=10001
glyphCount=75 flags=10010000
glyphCount=0 flags=10001
glyphCount=0 flags=10000
glyphCount=0 flags=10001
glyphCount=0 flags=10000
glyphCount=0 flags=10000
glyphCount=14 flags=10001
glyphCount=6 flags=10001

Then I see

<<<
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
     #12   [no CrawlURI]
        WAITING for 14s492ms
        Where: ABOUT_TO_GET_URI for 14494ms

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
>>>
<<<
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
     #27   http://ngdir.ir/MagneticLineament/MagneticLineament.asp?Cmd=MAP (0 attempts)
        LLL
        Current processor: Postselector
        WAITING for 1m16s218ms
        Where: ABOUT_TO_BEGIN_PROCESSOR for 75920ms

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
>>>
<<<
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
     #36   http://shamlou.org/index.php?option=com_pms&Itemid=34&page=new&id=405 (0 attempts)
        XLLXLLLLL
        Current processor: Postselector
        ACTIVE for 22s381ms
        Where: ABOUT_TO_BEGIN_PROCESSOR for 15475ms

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
>>>

and so on.

Let me know what else I can supply.

    -tree
